name: Sea of Glass
description:
Inspired by traditional Choose-Your-Own-Adventure books and poetic prose Sea of Glass is a journey through the life of one person struggling with mental health and societal pressures. This novel was written as a companion to the digital version available on the author’s website and for completion of her Masters of Arts degree from American University.  Sea of Glass is navigated by footnotes and the imagination of the reader to place themselves in the world of the Drowned God. Explore and make your way out of the City and learn what it means to be human and how to feel. If you are looking for an interactive experience guaranteed to be unlike anything you have ever read this is for you. 

You can also buy the physical version of this game on Amazon!
